Stallone is the reason

I got into films: John

Actor John Abraham, who idolises Sylvester Stallone, says the Hollywood star inspired him to take up acting.

“Sylvester Stallone is the reason I got into films. I still remember being awestruck when I watched Rocky IV on the big screen for the first time. I wanted to be like him, the underdog with a tough exterior and a soft heart,” John said. The 43-year-old actor pays tribute to his idol in his upcoming film Rocky Handsome , an action-packed thriller by Nishikant Kamat. — PTI
